deck.name: Three Musketeers
deck.description: Trio of powerful, independent markswomen, fighting for justice and honor. Disrespecting them would not be just a mistake, it would be a cardinal sin!

deck.name: Hog Rider
deck.description: Fast melee troop that targets buildings and can jump over the river. He followed the echoing call of "Hog Riderrrrr" all the way through the Arena doors.

deck.name: Dark Prince
deck.description: The Dark Prince deals area damage and lets his spiked club do the talking for him - because when he does talk, it sounds like he has a bucket on his head.

deck.name: Fireball
deck.description: Annnnnd... Fireball. Incinerates a small area, dealing high damage. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.name: Archers
deck.description: A pair of lightly armored ranged attackers. They'll help you take down ground and air units, but you're on your own with hair coloring advice.

deck.name: Tombstone
deck.description: Troop building that periodically deploys Skeletons to fight the enemy. When destroyed, spawns 4 Skeletons. Creepy!

deck.name: Goblins
deck.description: Three fast, unarmored melee attackers. Small, fast, green and mean!

deck.name: Zap
deck.description: Zaps enemies, briefly stunning them and dealing damage inside a small radius. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.name: P.E.K.K.A
deck.description: A heavily armored, slow melee fighter. Swings from the hip, but packs a huge punch.

deck.name: Balloon
deck.description: As pretty as they are, you won't want a parade of THESE balloons showing up on the horizon. Drops powerful bombs and when shot down, crashes dealing area damage.

deck.name: Fireball
deck.description: Annnnnd... Fireball. Incinerates a small area, dealing high damage. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.name: Wizard
deck.description: The most awesome man to ever set foot in the Arena, the Wizard will blow you away with his handsomeness... and/or fireballs.

deck.name: Dart Goblin
deck.description: Runs fast, shoots far and chews gum. How does he blow darts with a mouthful of Double Trouble Gum? Years of didgeridoo lessons.

deck.name: Zap
deck.description: Zaps enemies, briefly stunning them and dealing damage inside a small radius. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.description: Three fast, unarmored melee attackers. Small, fast, green and mean!

deck.description: Defensive building. Whenever it's not zapping the enemy, the power of Electrickery is best kept grounded.

deck.description: Don't be fooled by her delicately coiffed hair, the Musketeer is a mean shot with her trusty boomstick.

deck.description: Summons Skeletons, shoots destructo beams, has glowing pink eyes that unfortunately don't shoot lasers.

deck.description: Flying, armored and powerful. What could be its weakness?! Cupcakes.

deck.name: Lightning
deck.description: Bolts of lightning damage and stun up to three enemy troops or buildings with the most hitpoints in the target area. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.description: Spawns a handful of tiny flying creatures. Think of them as sweet, purple... balls of DESTRUCTION!

deck.name: Mega Knight
deck.description: He lands with the force of 1,000 mustaches, then jumps from one foe to the next dealing huge area damage. Stand aside!

deck.name: Balloon
deck.description: As pretty as they are, you won't want a parade of THESE balloons showing up on the horizon. Drops powerful bombs and when shot down, crashes dealing area damage.

deck.description: Shoots a focused beam of fire that increases in damage over time. Wears a helmet because flying can be dangerous.

deck.description: Zaps enemies, briefly stunning them and dealing damage inside a small radius. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.name: Ice Golem
deck.description: He's tough, targets buildings and explodes when destroyed, slowing nearby enemies. Made entirely out of ice... or is he?! Yes.

deck.name: Zappies
deck.description: Spawns a pack of miniature Zap machines. Who controls them...? Only the Master Builder knows.

deck.name: Valkyrie
deck.description: Tough melee fighter, deals area damage around her. Swarm or horde, no problem! She can take them all out with a few spins.

deck.description: The Miner can burrow his way underground and appear anywhere in the Arena. It's not magic, it's a shovel.

deck.name: Bats
deck.description: Spawns a handful of tiny flying creatures. Think of them as sweet, purple... balls of DESTRUCTION!

deck.name: Mega Knight
deck.description: He lands with the force of 1,000 mustaches, then jumps from one foe to the next dealing huge area damage. Stand aside!

deck.name: Balloon
deck.description: As pretty as they are, you won't want a parade of THESE balloons showing up on the horizon. Drops powerful bombs and when shot down, crashes dealing area damage.

deck.name: Inferno Dragon
deck.description: Shoots a focused beam of fire that increases in damage over time. Wears a helmet because flying can be dangerous.

deck.name: Zap
deck.description: Zaps enemies, briefly stunning them and dealing damage inside a small radius. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.name: Ice Golem
deck.description: He's tough, targets buildings and explodes when destroyed, slowing nearby enemies. Made entirely out of ice... or is he?! Yes.

deck.name: Furnace
deck.description: The Furnace spawns two Fire Spirits at a time. It also makes great brick-oven pancakes.

deck.name: Valkyrie
deck.description: Tough melee fighter, deals area damage around her. Swarm or horde, no problem! She can take them all out with a few spins.

deck.name: Ice Spirit
deck.description: Spawns one lively little Ice Spirit to freeze a group of enemies. Stay frosty.

deck.name: Skeletons
deck.description: Three fast, very weak melee fighters. Surround your enemies with this pile of bones!

deck.name: Poison
deck.description: Covers the area in a deadly toxin, damaging enemy troops and buildings over time. Yet somehow leaves the grass green and healthy. Go figure!

deck.name: The Log
deck.description: A spilt bottle of Rage turned an innocent tree trunk into "The Log". Now, it seeks revenge by crushing anything in its path!

deck.description: Zaps enemies, briefly stunning them and dealing damage inside a small radius. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.name: Musketeer
deck.description: Don't be fooled by her delicately coiffed hair, the Musketeer is a mean shot with her trusty boomstick.

deck.name: Fireball
deck.description: Annnnnd... Fireball. Incinerates a small area, dealing high damage. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.name: Hog Rider
deck.description: Fast melee troop that targets buildings and can jump over the river. He followed the echoing call of "Hog Riderrrrr" all the way through the Arena doors.

deck.name: Arrows
deck.description: Arrows pepper a large area, damaging all enemies hit. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.name: Cannon
deck.description: Defensive building. Shoots cannonballs with deadly effect, but cannot target flying troops.

deck.name: The Log
deck.description: A spilt bottle of Rage turned an innocent tree trunk into "The Log". Now, it seeks revenge by crushing anything in its path!

deck.name: Valkyrie
deck.description: Tough melee fighter, deals area damage around her. Swarm or horde, no problem! She can take them all out with a few spins.

deck.name: Inferno Dragon
deck.description: Shoots a focused beam of fire that increases in damage over time. Wears a helmet because flying can be dangerous.
